#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int store[7][10001];


int method( int balls, int runs)
{
    int mod = 10000007;
    
    if( runs <= 0){return 1;}
    else if ( balls == 0) { return 1;}
    else if( store[balls][runs] != -1)
    {
        return store[balls][runs];
    }
    else{
            store[balls][runs] = ((  ( 2*method(balls -1 , runs) % mod) + (method(balls -1 , runs-1) % mod) + (method(balls -1 , runs-2) % mod) + (method(balls -1 , runs-3) % mod) + (method(balls -1 , runs-4) % mod) + ( method(balls -1 , runs-6) % mod) + ( 2*method(balls , runs-1) % mod) + ( 2*method(balls , runs-2) % mod) + (method(balls , runs-3) % mod) + ( 2*method(balls , runs-5) % mod) + 1 + (method(balls, runs-7) % mod)) % mod);        
            return store[balls][runs];
        } 
}

int main()
{
    int T;
    int n;
    cin >> T;
    for( int i = 0; i < 7; i++){
        for( int j = 0; j <10001 ; j ++){
            store[i][j] = -1;
        }
    }
    
    for( int i = 0; i <T; i++){
        cin >> n;
        cout<< "Case " << i + 1 << ": " << method(6,n)<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
